name: Drone Kid
description:
You are a kid with a cute robot drone. It’s pretty dinky and can’t fly very far, so be sure to stay in range and maintain a direct connection. Make your way to some high vantage points so you can take some sick ass pictures!!!

Jam version made in 48h for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Updated version coming soon.

Controls

  • Move  Drone Kid - WASD
  • Move  Drone Drone - WASD
  • Jump - Space Bar 

Credits

  • Dallen Larson - Programmer / Lead
  • PepperTroopa - Artist
  • Nokutoka Momiji - Musician
  • Joshua Rieg - Programmer / Playtest
  • CH51 - Level Designer
